edu.vserver.exercises.helpers
Interface XmlEncHelper.BeanExerciseDataWrapper<E extends ExerciseData>

Type Parameters:
E - ExerciseData-implementor to be handled
All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Enclosing class:
XmlEncHelper<E extends ExerciseData>
public static interface XmlEncHelper.BeanExerciseDataWrapper<E extends ExerciseData>
extends java.io.Serializable

Implementor of this interface must be a Java-bean and know how to transform itself to represented ExerciseData-implementor and load its state from such.

Identity implementation is also permitted as long as the implementor is a Java-bean: 

 ExampleBean implements ExerciseData, BeanExerciseDataWrapper<ExampleBean> {
                ExampleBean toExerData { 
                        return this;
                }
                void loadFromData(ExampleBean loadFrom) {
                        // copy the state
                }
 
                // etc...
 }

Author:
Riku Haavisto

Method Summary
 void loadFromData(E loadFrom)
          Load the state for the XmlEncHelper.BeanExerciseDataWrapper from the ExerciseData-instance.
 E toExerData()
          Return ExerciseData-instance created from the current state of the XmlEncHelper.BeanExerciseDataWrapper.
 

Method Detail

loadFromData

void loadFromData(E loadFrom)
Load the state for the XmlEncHelper.BeanExerciseDataWrapper from the ExerciseData-instance.

Parameters:
loadFrom - ExerciseData-instance to be converted to a bean representation

toExerData

E toExerData()
Return ExerciseData-instance created from the current state of the XmlEncHelper.BeanExerciseDataWrapper.

Returns:
ExerciseData-instance of the current state of bean-representation
